transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello? Hello.
Executive: Hello. Sir, kaun si company se baat kar rahe hain aap?
Customer: GK Envirotech.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello. Kya sir?
Executive: Awaaz aa rahi hai? GK Envirotech se.
Customer: Haan ji sir.
Customer: GK Envirotech kaise hai?
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Ji sir boliye.
Executive: Ye keh rahe the bhai jo hamari details isme dali hui hai.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, awaaz aa rahi hai meri?
Customer: Haan sir, aap GK Envirotech se baat kar rahe hain na?
Executive: Haan. Mai keh raha tha jo isme hamari primary details dali hui hain.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Wo theek nahi hai. Jo humne aapko naya GST certificate bheja tha.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Uske according update kariye na. Isme address purane wala hai.
Customer: Isme address purane wala hai. Ek second sir mai aapki company khol ke dikhati hu.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: GK Envirotech, Shibu Kumar.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Hai na? Aur aapka jo GST hai, uska uska jo address hai wo hai.
Customer: Yaha ka.
Customer: Khata number 147 NS08 Janak Singh Pura Neemrana Kotputli Behror Rajasthan.
Executive: Aap sahi bata rahe hain lekin aap agar panel pe khol ke dekhenge na, to waha pe purana address hai. Shop number J 152 opposite Parle School Alwar.
Customer: Ek minute mai wo bhi open karke dekhti hu sir.

Executive: Aapne kaha open kiya? Kaha pe open karke aapne dekha?
Executive: Primary details.
Customer: Primary details panel panel pe hai na?
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Waise sir GST pe jo address hota hai wahi address aata hai. Baki aapko pata nahi kaise ho raha hai, wo mai dekhti hu. Isliye aapko call kiya.
Customer: Haan haan ek minute mai check kar leti hu. Thank you.
Executive: Ye editable hai ki warna mai kar deta isko.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Aapka yaha pe jo address aa raha hai wo shop number J 152 wala aa raha hai.
Executive: Haan. Haan.
Customer: Opposite Parle School, theek hai.
Customer: To sir ye ye address to aapki site se hi change ho sakta hai. Ya phir aap mujhe apna wo matlab mai aapko Editable nahi hai ye. Isiliye aapko Editable nahi hai.
Executive: Haan. Achha achha. Ek minute sir mai district center. Okay.
Customer: Line pe rahiye.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Sir?
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Ye address aapko nahi sir mai apne senior se puch rahi hu. Ye wala ye jo address hai.
Customer: Ye inka site ka address hai na, ye inko change karna hai aur GST pe dusra address hai aur ispe dusra address hai. GST mangwao.
Customer: Sir, hello.
Executive: Hmm hmm. Hello.
Customer: Sir aapke paas GST ka wo three page wala PDF hoga na?
Executive: Haan aapko share kiya hua abhi hai. Mai aapko aap koi WhatsApp se hi kariye mai dobara bhej deta hu.
Customer: Ek baar aap apna number bataiye. Mai aapko WhatsApp pe wo bhejti hu. 890.
Executive: 890.
Executive: 90.
Executive: 590.
Customer: 590.
Executive: 7470.
Customer: 7470.
Executive: 747.
Executive: Zero.

Customer: Aaya message sir aapke paas?
Executive: Haan mai aapko share karta hu ek minute ruko.
Customer: Haan mai call pe hu aap PDF share kijiye mai ek baar check karti hu.
Executive: Hmm.

Customer: Shibu Kumar, GK Envirotech aur building number khata 47 street number. Haan isme alag hai aapka address aur usme alag hai na? Ye aapko change karna hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Ek hi proprietor hai na, aap hi hai na Shibu Kumar, hai na?
Executive: Haan ji. Haan ji.
Customer: To theek hai sir mai complaint dal deti hu aur aapka ek within one two days me aapka address change ho jayega.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai sir. Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to update the address on IndiaMART.

- Current address is old, needs new GST address.



Resolution:

- Executive shared GST PDF on WhatsApp.

- Complaint registered for address change.

- Address will be updated within 1-2 days.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- address update, gst, profile, company details
